Module kivakit.core
Package com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.alarms

Interface MessageAlarm

All Superinterfaces:
Listener, NamedObject, Receiver, Transceiver, Transmitter
All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseMessageAlarm, EmailMessageAlarm
public interface MessageAlarm extends Listener
A message alarm is a listener that triggers via trigger(Rate) when shouldTrigger() returns true.
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)

  • Method Details

    • shouldTrigger

      boolean shouldTrigger()
      Returns:
      True if the alarm should be triggered

    • trigger

      void trigger​(Rate rate)
      Executes the action for this message alarm. The action that takes place depends on the implementation. For example, the alarm might send an email or text message, or it might write information to an incident log.
      Parameters:
      rate - The rate of errors that triggered this alarm
